## registerAdapters() function

Registers one or more adapters for image transformation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerAdapters: (...adapters: Adapter[]) => void
```

adapters

One or more adapters to register.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

void

## Example

```ts
registerAdapters(adapterOne, adapterTwo);
```
